repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get update -y && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-pip python-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /app

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir flask flask-session pycrypto

COPY . /app

ENTRYPOINT [ "python" ]

CMD [ "serve.py" ]
